message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. It's a great deal considering the product's value and rarity. I'm confident you'll love it!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10800. It's a great compromise considering the product's value and rarity. I think you'll be happy with this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity, and it's the highest I'm willing to go.
